assertions.assertion: clock_getcpuclockid() takes a process ID, pid, as input and returns the CPU-time clock, clock_id.
If pid=0, then clock_getcpuclockid() will return the CPU-time clock of the calling process.
The clock_getcpuclockid() function shall fail and return EPERM if the requesting process does not have permission to access the CPU-time clock for the process.
The clock_getcpuclockid() function may fail and return ESRCH if no process can be found corresponding to the process specified by pid.
